hours_text:
* * *

### Our Mission

**Inspiring our community through art and nature while honoring those who fought for freedom.**

_OMAM was founded in 1946 as a tribute to creative freedom and those who fought valiantly to defend it. Many local World War II veterans participated in building the galleries and clearing the land for the gardens._

**[READ MORE>](/who-we-are/history.html)**

* * *

#### Come for an hour & leave inspired!

## Plan Your Visit

Ormond Memorial Art Museum & Gardens was founded in 1946 with a mission to inspire the community through art and nature while honoring those who fought for freedom.

The Museum hosts several exhibitions each year featuring work in a variety of mediums by national and international artists, in addition to annual shows highlighting art by area students. Also on display is a rotating selection of spiritual oil paintings from the Malcolm Fraser Permanent Collection in the reception gallery, and a special installation of neo-pop art by John Wilton in the stairwell gallery. Each month, OMAM engages with their community by providing free art pop-ups and other outreach events, including programs designed for underserved children, families, and veterans, as well as patients, caregivers, and survivors.

# Bar Packages & Pricing

**All alcohol consumed at private rental events must be supplied by OMAM.** To help simplify your event-planning experience, we offer four bar service options with three alcohol packages.

## Bar Options

  * **CASH BAR:** Guests select and pay for their own drinks. Cash prices include sales tax & service charges.

  * **SPLIT BAR:** Service is split Host/Cash (example: Host provides 1-2 complimentary drinks per guest, and then it turns into a cash bar).

  * **OPEN BAR:** Host selects package and is billed based on guest count prior to the event.

  * **CONSUMPTION BAR:** Host selects package and is billed upon consumption after the event.

* * *

##### All packages include $1 soda (Coke products) and bottled water.

### Wine & Beer Package

 _$6 glass of house wine / $5 premium beer / $3 domestic beer_  
Includes house wines. Host selects four beer options.  
**Open Bar:** $25 per person for four hours ($2 per person each additional hour)

 _$6 glass of house wine / $8 house cocktail / $5 premium beer / $3 domestic beer_  
Includes house wines and well spirits. Host chooses four beer options.  
**Open Bar:** $30 per person for four hours ($2 per person each additional hour)
